citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Approximately a month ago, "Sequoia", a male hedgehog born on 8/18/21 had some kind of injury to it's right eye. The
licensee reported the hedgehog had it's eye crusted shut with dried up blood. The abnormal eye has a whitish/pinkish
color to it. The licensee did not contact the Attending Veterinarian. Eye injuries can be painful. If the eye was infected, the
infection could lead to further problems. Not contacting the Attending Veterinarian doesn't ensure the animal is receiving
adequate veterinary care. The licensee must contact the Attending Veterinarian and follow whatever treatment plan is
given for the hedgehog. Correct by 2/9/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Approximately a month ago, "Sequoia", a male hedgehog born on 8/18/21 had some kind of injury to it's right eye. The 
licensee reported the hedgehog had it's eye crusted shut with dried up blood. The abnormal eye has a whitish/pinkish 
color to it. The licensee did not contact the Attending Veterinarian. Eye injuries can be painful. If the eye was infected, the 
infection could lead to further problems. Not contacting the Attending Veterinarian doesn't ensure the animal is receiving 
adequate veterinary care. The licensee must contact the Attending Veterinarian and follow whatever treatment plan is 
given for the hedgehog. Correct by 2/9/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
